dataSources.name: Melbourne pedestrian counting system
comments: Lags behind by several hours to a day.
Good for retrospective analysis, possibly prediction.
Maybe real time can be granted?

dataSources.name: Transport NSW Crash Statistics
comments: Might have issues gathering and processing such temporally rich data

dataSources.name: Strava
comments: demo available, but they are not responding to my emails

dataSources.name: City of Melbourne Data
comments: good sidewalk data, but it's non-linear and will need to be processed along with other data
